headline: UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (UNH) Shareholders Push for Independent Board Chair
summary: UnitedHealth Group Inc. (NYSE:UNH) is one of the best stocks in Michael Burry’s stock portfolio. On October 3, the company’s shareholders proposed the adoption of an independent board chair. The position is currently held by Stephen Hemsley, Chief Executive Officer. While Hemsley has served as board chair since 2017, he assumed the role of CEO in […]

headline: CVS' Aetna Wins Big on 2026 MA Star Ratings: How to Play the Stock?
